location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘24. Diagram of the Crossing of Adhaim by 38th Brigade & Cassels Cavalry 17th/18th April 1917’ and ‘Diagram of Action at Band-i-Adhaim 30th April 1917’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:101 x 135 mm or smaller, on sheet 234 x 185 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Heliozincographed at the Survey of India Offices, Dehra Dun. S.D.O. 3953-2-25.Distinctive Features:Two small sketch maps of Band-i-Adhaim [Nahr al ‘Uz̧aym] and surrounding area produced to illustrate the British campaign in Mesopotamia showing movements of British and Turkish military forces in April 1917 with location of Turkish camp shown and landmarks lettered for reference.
